body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         We're gearing up to celebrate the NPS Centennial. Join us in the celebration! NPS  The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. To us, it's not about cakes and candles â€”it's about being an organization ready to take on the challenges of our second century. Hagerman Fossil Beds is a part of this effort. Take a look at what we're doing locally and get involved!
title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Get Involved
